author: Clare Duffy, CNN Business
title: Disneyland and Walt Disney World to remain closed because of coronavirus
description: Disneyland in California and Walt Disney World resort in Florida will remain closed until further notice as the coronavirus outbreak continues to spread in the United States, the company said.
content:
New York (CNN Business)Disneyland in California and Walt Disney World resort in Florida will remain closed until further notice as the coronavirus outbreak continues to spread in the United States, the company said.
